Name: P30 - EXTERNAL Î”V
checklistText:
P30 - EXTERNAL Î”V

Purpose of PGNCS External Î”V (P30)
procedure is to accept targeting
parameters from source(s) external
to LGC and, from theae data, comÂ­
pute velocity and other initial con
-
ditions required by LGC for desired
maneuver. PGNCS-required parameters
are TIG and Î”V vector.


	LGC Power-Up (required)
	External Î”V data received (required)
	IMU Power-Up (LGC Operating)

1.	Key V37E 30E

2.	FL V06 N33 - TIG
		R1 00XXX hr
		R2 000XX min
		R3 0XX.XX sec
		Accept: Record TIG
		Key PRO
		Reject: Key V25E - Load desired
		TIG

3.	FL 06 N81 - Î”V (LV)
		R1 X XXXX.X fps
		R2 Y XXXX.X fps
		R3 Z XXXX.X fps
		Accept: Key PRO
		Reject: Key V25E - Load desired
		Î”V data

Remarks:
	Stored components of impulsive Î”V
	along LM local vertical axes at TIG.

4.	FL V06 N42 - Calculated thrusting
	parameters
		R1 Ha XXXX.X nm
		R2 Hp XXXX.X nm
		R3 Î”V XXXX.X fps
		Accept: Key PRO
		Rejecct: Terminate

5.	FL V16 N45 - Maneuver data
		R1 M	XXXXX
		R2 TFI	XXBXX min-sec
		R3 MGA	XXX.XXÂ°

6.	Begin countdown to TIG:
	Set EVNT TMR to count-down
	Load TIG into EVNT TMR ind
		Pre-set the EVNT TMR to
		for example 30 minutes.
		When TIG is 30 minutes away
		start the EVNT TMR.
	Key PRO

7.	P00
